verbs.description: WASHINGTON — [ARG0: Republican lawmakers and President Donald Trump] [V: searched] [ARGM-MNR: anxiously] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday evening] [ARG1: for a way to end the administration 's policy of separating families after illegal border crossings , with their focus shifting to a new plan to keep children in detention longer than now permitted — but with their parents] .
